February 13, 2014 at 06:56PM it copies the link information for every tab open in Safari, and outputs them as a list, based on a user-defined template. You set up your template in the Extension settings, and use the following variables to define your link style:

%u = URL
%t = title
%w = window index
%n = tab index (within window) http://ift.tt/1mdGQEg
